{{Chú thích tạp chí
| last = George 
| first = Orel
| authorlink = 
| editor = [[Peter G. Wilson]], [[A. S. Curry]] & [[Lưu Hồng Trường]]
| date = 2013-10-18
| title = Camellia oconoriana (Theaceae), a new species from Vietnam
| trans-title = {{PAGENAME}} (Họ Chè), một loài mới từ Việt Nam
| journal = Edinburgh Journal of Botany
| volume = 70
| issue = 03
| pages = 439-447
| publisher = [[Đại học Cambridge|Cambridge University Press]]
| location = [[Cambridge]]
| doi = 10.1017/S0960428613000103
| url = http://journals.cambridge.org/action/displayAbstract?fromPage=online&aid=9037265
| language = en
| access-date = 2014-01-10
| quote = The new species ''Camellia oconoriana'' Orel, Curry & Luu (Theaceae), endemic to Lam Dong Province, Vietnam, is described and illustrated. It is compared to Camellia species in sections ''Archaecamellia'', ''Stereocarpus'', ''Piquetia'' and ''Chrysantha''. Morphological evidence supports a transitional placement in ''Camellia'' sect. ''Chrysantha'' ser. ''Chrysanthae''.
}}
